name: Race Time (itch)
description:
A simple 2D racing game you can easily pick up and put down. The main objective of the game is to get the best lap and or best total time you are able.

Features

  • Simple UI to keep track of your best and total time  
  • Smooth acceleration and turning   
  • Friction when you are driving  too close to the wall

Feedback is welcome and may even get added to the game in an update.
